div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1669 Egypt, 1894 (364) Burial: c. 310 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 79+ AR Alexander III: 56 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 11, Lampsacus 1, Sardes 1, Side 3, Tarsus 3, Myriandrus 2, Citium 2, Sidon 1, Babylon 10, Susa 1, Alexandreia 1, unc. 20) Philip III: 9 tetradr. (Salamis 2, Marathus 1, Babylon 4, Susa 2) Ptolemy I: 14 tetradr. (Alexander hd./ Zeus 2, Alexander hd./Athena, Attic wt. 12) Disposition: Cairo 14 (Ptolemy I); Alex- andria 3 Dutilh, AN 1895, pp. 73-92 (esp. pp. 74-5, tables B, C, D; refs. to MÃ¼ller, illus.) Svoronos, Ptolemies 4, p. 401, nos. 6, 12
